original_text: One day, the believers were meeting together. They were praising the Lord God and they were praying. They also fasted for a time. During that time, the Holy Spirit said to them, ‘I have chosen Barnabas and Saul to do a special work for me. Let them go now and do it.’
korean_text: 주를 섬겨 금식할 때에 성령이 이르시되 내가 불러 시키는 일을 위하여 바나바와 사울을 따로 세우라 하시니

sentences.original_text: One day, the believers were meeting together.
They were praising the Lord God
They also fasted for a time.
During that time, the Holy Spirit said to them,
I have chosen Barnabas and Saul
to do a special work for me.
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 위해 특별한 일을 하도록 하라.

sentences.original_text: Let them go now and do it.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 가서 그 일을 행하게 하라.
